titles.title: Honoring Bishop Noel Jones for his 17 years of service to the City of Refuge Church.
Honoring Bishop Noel Jones for his 17 years of service to the City of Refuge Church.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: Honors Bishop Noel Jones on the occasion of his 17th pastoral anniversary and his philanthropy, service, and social justice efforts in Los Angeles, California.
